titles.title: Reduce Individuals' Dependence on Energy Act of 2007
RIDE Act of 2007
To amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1986 to provide individuals a deduction for certain mass public transportation expenses.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Ways and Means.

bill.summary: 5/23/2007--Introduced. Reduce Individuals' Dependence on Energy Act of 2007 or the RIDE Act of 2007 - Amends the Internal Revenue Code to allow individual taxpayers a deduction from gross income for transportation expenses on federal, state, or local government mass transit facilities.
